Articles.Content:
Are there any Orion style 3.75 m capsules? I already tried the Taurus HVC and didn't like it.

Edited May 6, 2015 by Laythe Dweller

They the one from Chaka Monkey Exploration. That's a beautiful Orion replica, and it's 3.75m.

SmallFatFetus
That pack has way too many parts, and when I try to prune it down the pod doesn't show up either. Is there any other pack with a 3.75m command pod?

The American Pack http://www./download/dptj659hz8r8gn2/AmericanPack.zip and there is a Chaka Monkey Exploration lite https://www.dropbox.com/s/gbd5wyw7l71mrhg/COL-271.zip?dl=0 which is just SLS.

EDIT- And there is this WIP it does need some more parts http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015

Edit- Now, I think about it there just alittle bigger then 3.75, I think one time, I wrote a rescale for the The American Pack to be 3.75

Edited May 5, 2015 by Mecripp2
Wow, you're probably the most helpful person on the forums!

Are there any Orion style 3.75 m capsules? I already tried the Taurus HVC and didn't like it.

Nertea has one 3.75m command pod each in his Stockalike Station Expansion and his Near Future Spacecraft
Taurus HCV - the best 3.75m utility pack for now. Looks pretty Orion-ish.

Taurus HCV - the best 3.75m utility pack for now. Looks pretty Orion-ish.

But OP stated he didn't like the Taurus HCV

But OP stated he didn't like the Taurus HCV

An opinion that has to be ignored on principle!

/kidding

Nice collection in here!

Theres NovaPunch (a large parts pack) which has the Freya (or Freyja) command module, I think that's supposed to be Orion-like, it's 3.75m too.

The Taurus HCV is based more on the Dragon I believe.

Nertea has one in his near future spacecraft parts

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/52042-1-02-Near-Future-Technologies-%28NFSolar-NFSpacecraft-NFConstruction-hotfixed%29

The SDHI pack looks good, can someone scale up the parts to 3.75m so I can use it with a capsule?

- - - Updated - - -

Alright, I am going to start a new thread requesting an Orion replica as there's not really any good ones out there. Requesting that this thread be locked.
